nebula

Nebula colormap array.

Syntax

c = nebula
c = nebula(m)

Input argument

m

a scalar integer value: Number of colors (256 as default value).

Output argument

c

Nebula colormap array.

Description

nebula returns the colormap with nebula colors.

Example

f = figure();
n = 256;
cmap = nebula(n);
colormap(cmap);
imagesc(peaks(100));
colorbar;
title(['Nebula Colormap with ', num2str(n), ' Colors']);

See also

colormap.

History

Version Description
1.14.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
